issue.title: cmake: pass WEST_PYTHON to child image builds

labels.name: external
labels.description: External contribution

labels.name: changelog-entry-required

issue.body: Without this, child images keep picking up my system python and then complaining about `yaml` module not being present.

pull_request.title: drivers: sdhc: have sdhc-spi-slot declare an sd bus
pull_request.body:
The vscode extension, at least, complains if you try to put a `zephyr,sdmmc-disk` node under a `zephyr,sdhc-spi-slot` node because the latter does not declare an sd bus.

I do not know why this doesn't cause test failures.

issue.title: spack: Should report error if `jsc.minify`/`jsc.module` is specified.

milestone.title: Planned
milestone.description:
This is used to mark issues as required. Once an issue in this milestone is fixed, it will be moved to an appropriate milestone.

This is used to filter issues which are good to work but not planned out.

issue.body:
`jsc.minify` is not an option for spack.
It's accidentally allowed because spack uses same code as .transform().

comment.body: How does one enable mangling of the output? Run the output of spack through swc again?
